drones

Class Drone

  • java.lang.Object
    • drones.Sprite
      • drones.Drone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleDrone, CornerDrone, Dummy, HexagonDrone, RandomDrone, SquareDrone, TracingDrone, TurningDrone

    public abstract class Drone
extends Sprite
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Basic drone class for creating drones on top of it.
    Version:
    06/05/2019
    Author:
    Baykam Say

      • scan

        public final boolean scan(java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D.Double e,
                          int width,
                          int height)
        Scans the trajectory of the drone, if the ellipse is on the front returns true; if not returns false.
        Parameters:
        e - The ellipse that will be tested
        width - The width of the board
        height - The height of the board
        Returns:
        true if the ellipse is in front of the drone, false if not.

      • getIntersection

        public final java.awt.Point getIntersection(java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D.Double e,
                                            int width,
                                            int height)
        Deprecated. 
        This method has been deprecated, as we couldn't fix the errors. Returns the intersection point of the line of sight of the drone and the ellipse that is chosen.Also calculates the distance between this point and the drone.
        Parameters:
        e - The ellipse that will be tested
        width - The width of the board
        height - The height of the board
        Returns:
        The intersection point of the line of sight of the drone and the ellipse that is chosen.
